ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the Tropical Feed Resources Research and Development Center (TROFREC), Department of Animal Science, Faculty of Agriculture, Khon Kaen University, Thailand, Thailand Research Fund (TRF) through the Royal Golden Jubilee Ph.D. Scholarship, TRF-IRG5980010 and TRF-IRN57W0002, for supporting the research budgets and the use of the research facilities.
